Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Reckless Driver Enforcement Pipeline

Comprehensive crowdsourced traffic enforcement system that turns dashcams
into mobile citation cameras with court-admissible evidence packages.

Backend:
- ViolationReport model with 25+ violation types, chain of custody tracking,
  community verification voting, and law enforcement/insurance submissions
- Traffic codes config for CA, FL, TX, NY, GA with fines, points, penalties
- Evidence packager service with SHA-256 hashing, video metadata extraction,
  key frame extraction, PDF manifest generation, and ZIP packaging
- Law enforcement submission service with email-based evidence delivery
- Insurance violation reporting service completing InsuranceClaim.jsx backend

Frontend:
- ReportViolation.jsx: 7-step form wizard for reporting violations
- ViolationDetail.jsx: Evidence gallery, custody timeline, voting, submissions
- MyViolationReports.jsx: Dashboard with stats and submission tracking

API endpoints for CRUD, evidence management, community voting, police/insurance
submissions, traffic code lookups, and moderator review queue.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Police Portal Dashboard for law enforcement review

Build dedicated web portal for officers to review crowdsourced violation reports with inline video playback, case management, and citation issuance. Officers authenticate with department credentials, view cases in their jurisdiction, stream evidence videos without downloading, and update case status with complete audit trail tracking. Includes department stats, officer leaderboard, and admin tools for portal enablement.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
